Ingredients.4: 1 (1 ounce) package dry onion soup mix

Ingredients.5: 1 salt and ground black pepper to taste

Ingredients.7: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  cream of mushroom soup

Directions.1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).

Directions.2: Mix ground beef, eggs, bread crumbs, dry soup mix, salt, and pepper together in a large bowl; add about 1/2 the can of beef broth and continue mixing until beef mixture is thoroughly moistened. Divide mixture into six portions and shape into patties.

Directions.3: Heat a Dutch oven over medium heat. Brown patties in the hot pot, 3 to 5 minutes per side. Spoon excess grease from the pot.

Directions.4: Stir remaining beef broth with cream of mushroom soup and dry mustard in a bowl until smooth; pour over the browned patties.

Directions.5: Bake in preheated oven until patties are no longer pink in the center, about 45 minutes. An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 160 degrees F (70 degrees C).
